resumeText:
JOHN DOE
Software Engineer
john.doe@email.com | linkedin.com/in/johndoe

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Passionate Software Engineer with 3 years of experience building scalable web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in agile teams.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
- Languages: JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS
- Frontend: React, Redux, Tailwind CSS, Material-UI
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js, REST APIs
- Database: MongoDB, MySQL
- Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Postman, Jira
- Other: Agile/Scrum, Unit Testing (Jest), Responsive Design

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Software Engineer | Tech Solutions Inc. | Jan 2022 - Present
- Developed and maintained 5+ web applications using React and Node.js
- Implemented RESTful APIs serving 10,000+ daily active users
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodology
- Reduced application load time by 40% through code optimization
- Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers

Junior Developer | StartupXYZ | Jun 2021 - Dec 2021
- Built responsive web interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS
- Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing and analytics
- Fixed bugs and implemented new features based on user feedback
- Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs

EDUCATION
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
University of Technology | 2018 - 2021
GPA: 3.7/4.0

PROJECTS

E-Commerce Platform
- Built full-stack e-commerce application with React and Node.js
- Implemented user authentication, shopping cart, and payment integration
- Deployed on Heroku with MongoDB Atlas database
- Technologies: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Stripe API

Task Management App
- Created a collaborative task management tool
- Features include drag-and-drop, real-time updates, and team collaboration
- Technologies: React, Redux, Firebase, Material-UI

CERTIFICATIONS
- JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures (freeCodeCamp)
- React - The Complete Guide (Udemy)
- Node.js Developer Course (Udemy)
jobDescriptionText:
SENIOR FULL STACK DEVELOPER
TechCorp Solutions | Remote | Full-time

ABOUT THE ROLE
We are seeking a talented Senior Full Stack Developer to join our growing engineering team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying scalable microservices-based applications using modern technologies.

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Design and implement microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes
- Build scalable backend services with TypeScript and PostgreSQL
- Develop modern frontend applications using Next.js and TypeScript
- Implement CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and AWS
- Write comprehensive unit and integration tests
- Collaborate with DevOps team for cloud infrastructure (AWS)
- Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
- Participate in architectural decisions and technical planning

REQUIRED SKILLS
- 5+ years of experience in full stack development
- Strong proficiency in TypeScript (frontend and backend)
- Experience with Next.js or similar React frameworks
- Solid understanding of PostgreSQL and database design
- Hands-on experience with Docker and container orchestration
- Knowledge of Kubernetes for container management
- Experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
- Familiarity with CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, or similar)
- Understanding of microservices architecture patterns
- Strong knowledge of REST API design and GraphQL
- Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)
- Version control with Git and collaborative development workflows

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
- Experience with serverless architecture (AWS Lambda)
- Knowledge of Redis for caching and session management
- Familiarity with monitoring tools (DataDog, New Relic)
- Experience with message queues (RabbitMQ, SQS)
- Understanding of OAuth2 and JWT authentication
- Contributions to open-source projects
- Technical blog writing or speaking at conferences

WHAT WE OFFER
- Competitive salary: $120,000 - $160,000
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- 401(k) with company match
- Unlimited PTO and flexible work hours
- Professional development budget
- Remote work with occasional team offsites
- Latest MacBook Pro and work-from-home setup stipend
- Stock options

TECH STACK
- Frontend: TypeScript, Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL
- Infrastructure: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Terraform
- CI/CD: GitHub Actions, AWS CodePipeline
- Monitoring: DataDog, CloudWatch
- Testing: Jest, Cypress, Playwright

TO APPLY
Please submit your resume along with:
- GitHub profile showcasing your projects
- Links to production applications you've built
- Brief description of your most challenging technical project

TechCorp Solutions is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and inclusion.
